metadata.title: CVE-2020-24613 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: wolfSSL before 4.5.0 mishandles TLS 1.3 server data in the WAIT_CERT_CRstate, within SanityCheckTls13MsgReceived() in tls13.c. This is anincorrect implementation of the TLS 1.3 client state machine. This allowsattackers in a privileged network position to completely impersonate anyTLS 1.3 servers, and read or modify potentially sensitive informationbetween clients using the wolfSSL library and these TLS servers.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
